author: akosut
msg: Take the <HostAlias> functionality added earlier, and fold it back
into <VirtualHost>. This hopefully makes for a config file that makes
more sense, plus it allows for easier transition, since the conf files
do not have to be changed. A ServerAlias directive has been added,
which goes inside the <VirtualHost> and can provide additional names
which that host will recognize itself as. These can include wildcards,
e.g. "ServerAlias *.foo.com foo.bar.net foo.com". The canonical name
is given by the <VirtualHost> directive or a ServerName.

author: jim
msg: add per process counters and PID info to status

author: mjc
msg: Improved generated HTML and added scoreboard explanations

author: mjc
msg: The status of a child should not be reset when the child dies.  If it is
then we lose all the information that child had within it and our total
access counts and bytes served are meaningless.

author: jim
msg: Reset STATUS counters for dead servers
